Translations.Text: O believers! Do not be like those who slandered Moses, but God cleared him of what they said. And he was honourable in the sight of God
O believers! Be mindful of God, and say what is right
He will bless your deeds for you, and forgive your sins. And whoever obeys God and His Messenger, has truly achieved a great triumph

Indeed, We offered the trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains, but they ˹all˺ declined to bear it, being fearful of it. But humanity assumed it, ˹for˺ they are truly wrongful ˹to themselves˺ and ignorant ˹of the consequences˺
so that God will punish hypocrite men and women and polytheistic men and women, and God will turn in mercy to believing men and women. For God is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful
